name: TWO STARS
description:
This was made in 4 days for the 2019 Screamworld Game Jam, including all assets. I came late to the jam due to getting my demo of NEMESES out, so this is what I was able to put together. It was originally going to be a horror game, but I couldn't get the planet mechanics working right for a monster, and the project took a completely different direction last minute. A creature was modeled, textured, animated, and placed in the game, but trying to make it follow the player around a moon caused all sorts of erratic behavior. Mostly spinning aimlessly off into space. 

The actual story was designed and implemented during the final evening. Pardon the terrible voice acting, and my attempt at voicing a female character. Hope you like it!

*UPDATE* I couldn't get a really important piece of the game to work by the deadline, so I added an updated version. It's after the submission cutoff, but to get the full experience of the game, I recommend playing the update. It's mainly one really small, but really important detail. It was in the original version, the timing was just really off.
